disease.tree2table: SELECT `data_attr_data`.`pid` as `pid`,`p_data_attr_data`.`data` as `pd`, `data_attr_data`.`sid` as `mid`,`data_attr_data`.`data` as `md` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_data` `p_data_attr_data` ON `data_attr_data`.`pid` = `p_data_attr_data`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = 2 AND `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 1;
disease.getInfoes: SELECT `data_attr_data`.*,`data_attr_meta`.`level` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_meta` ON `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = `data_attr_meta`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 1 AND `data_attr_data`.`pid` = :pid
disease.getLvById: SELECT `data_attr_meta`.`level` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_meta` ON `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = `data_attr_meta`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`sid` = :sid AND `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 1;
disease.removeById: DELETE `data_attr_data`,`data_article_dis`, `data_doctor_dis` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_article_dis` ON `data_attr_data`.`sid` = `data_article_dis`.`did` LEFT JOIN `data_doctor_dis` ON `data_attr_data`.`sid` = `data_doctor_dis`.`did` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`sid` = :sid AND data_attr_data.`grp` = 1
disease.removeByPid: DELETE `data_attr_data`,`data_article_dis`, `data_doctor_dis` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_article_dis` ON `data_attr_data`.`sid` = `data_article_dis`.`did` LEFT JOIN `data_doctor_dis` ON `data_attr_data`.`sid` = `data_doctor_dis`.`did` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`pid` = :sid AND data_attr_data.`grp` = 1

meta.getInfoesByGrp: SELECT * FROM `data_attr_meta` WHERE `grp` = 1 ORDER BY `level` ASC
